## Assignments / Readings

- **Read Chapter 3 in {{< var dykes2019 >}}**, consult the [Reading  Remarks](../readings.qmd) for the Chapter. 
- **Make one visual** where you visualize distributions of a numerical variable over different categories. Use the data you find in the [VisCom_Playground](https://github.com/{{< var org.name >}}/VisCom_Playground) in the {{< var org.name >}} Repositories. You can also use data you find yourself. We want to share these in class.
